{{infobox character | people=[[Rohirrim|Rohir]] | name=Elfhild | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Rohan]] | affiliation= | language=[[Rohanese]] and [[Westron]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{TA|2978}} | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse=[[Théoden]] | children=[[Théodred]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }}'''Elfhild''' was the wife of King [[Théoden]]. ==History== Elfhild died in childbirth, leaving Théoden a widower and [[Théodred]] motherless.
